summary: NOTICED EXCESSIVE NOISE WHEN USING SWAY BAR.  BATTERIES SHOVED NEXT TO BODY OF TRAILER. PLATES BENT DUE TO TIGHTENING OF SETSCREWS. OBSERVED INADEQUATE ATTACHMENT OF TONGUE TO CHASSIS. WHEELS CONNECTED DIRECTLY TO TRAILER CAUSING ROOF TO CRACK AND ADDED STRESS ON WALLS. POTENTIAL FOR TONGUE TO BREAK AWAY FROM TRAILER,INCREASED DIFFICULTY CONTROLLING TRAILER, AND ROOF DISLODGE AND BLOW OFF. KOMFORT 2010 SATELLITE TRAILER 299RB. *TR
